data.comment: Reading kick-off the first half - the match is underway!
Lucas Joao (Reading) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Madejski Stadium.
Wycombe have kicked-off the second half at Madejski Stadium.
Tomas Esteves is replacing Tom Holmes for Reading at Madejski Stadium.
In the minute 57, Reading make their second substitution with Alfa Semedo replacing Yakou Meite.
Reading take a 1-0 lead thanks to Lucas Joao.
The away team replace Scott Kashket with Fred Onyedinma.
In the minute 68, Adebayo Akinfenwa is replacing Alex Samuel for the away team.
Andy Rinomhota for Reading has been booked by Andy Davies and receives a first yellow card.
Gareth Ainsworth (Wycombe) is making a third substitution, with Anis Mehmeti replacing Matt Bloomfield.
The match has come to a close in Reading. The final score is 1-0.
